4. Metadata
Are PDB metadata not suitable for your protein sequences? Also check which metadata standards are used byreporistories you plan to use: GenBank, GEO.

5. Storage
Is there no suitable KU Leuven managed storage you can use in stead of dropbox? Have a look here: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en

Under storage you mention EGA, but I see no human-related omics data.

7. Data sharing
For non-omics digital data you can use KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
